author: Pierre de la Palud (1277?-1342)
title: Sequuntur perutiles sermones quadragesimales Tesauri novi, nuper summa cum diligentia emendati. Venundantur Parrhisiis, in via Jacobea, a Francisco Regnault, sub intersignio Sancti Claudii. [Auctore Petro de Palude]. - A la fin : Opus perutile, Sermonum
imprint: "Venundantur Parrhisiis, in via Jacobea, a Francisco Regnault, sub intersignio Sancti Claudii"
